Citation_Information.author_list: St. Clair, M; Million, C.; Siegler, M.
Citation_Information.description: This table contains data from 1972 to 1977 for the upper gradient bridge of Apollo 17 probe 1 in this bundle's 'split' format. It includes data from PDS3 product A17A-L-HFE-3-THERMAL-CONDUCTIVITY-V1.0:A17_HFE_P1_1-201201, PDS4 product urn:nasa:pds:a17hfe_calibrated_arcsav:data:a17_hfe_1975_l2_arcsav_tg11, and data released by Nagihara et al. along with the article "Examination of the Long‐Term Subsurface Warming Observed at the Apollo 15 and 17 Sites Utilizing the Newly Restored Heat Flow Experiment Data From 1975 to 1977," JGR Planets 123 (5), May 2018, doi: 10.1029/2018JE005579.

Source_Product_External.description: Data released with publication: Nagihara et al., Examination of the Long‐Term Subsurface Warming Observed at the Apollo 15 and 17 Sites Utilizing the Newly Restored Heat Flow Experiment Data From 1975 to 1977, JGR Planets 123 (5), May 2018. Contains data recovered from ARCSAV tapes.

Table_Delimited.name: a17p1f1_split
Table_Delimited.description: This table contains data from 1972 to 1977 for the upper gradient bridge of Apollo 17 probe 1 in this bundle's 'split' format. It includes data from PDS3 product A17A-L-HFE-3-THERMAL-CONDUCTIVITY-V1.0:A17_HFE_P1_1-201201, PDS4 product urn:nasa:pds:a17hfe_calibrated_arcsav:data:a17_hfe_1975_l2_arcsav_tg11, and data released by Nagihara et al. along with the article "Examination of the Long‐Term Subsurface Warming Observed at the Apollo 15 and 17 Sites Utilizing the Newly Restored Heat Flow Experiment Data From 1975 to 1977," JGR Planets 123 (5), May 2018, doi: 10.1029/2018JE005579.

Field_Delimited.name: Time
Field_Delimited.description: Earth-received date and time of observation.

Field_Delimited.name: TG11A
Field_Delimited.description: Temperature of the bridge's upper thermometer. (T - dT) for each point imported from NSSDC data; explicitly-given temperature value for each point imported from Nagihara et al. data.

Field_Delimited.name: TG11B
Field_Delimited.description: Temperature of the bridge's upper thermometer. (T + dT) for each point imported from NSSDC data; explicitly-given temperature value for each point imported from Nagihara et al. data.

Field_Delimited.name: flags
Field_Delimited.description: Bitmask marking special features of some data points.
